metadata.title: USN-6730-1 -- Apache Maven Shared Utils vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Apache Maven Shared Utils did not handle double-quoted strings properly, allowing shell injection attacks. This could allow an attacker to run arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6730-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libmaven-shared-utils-java - 3.3.0-1ubuntu0.22.04.1 libmaven-shared-utils-java-doc - 3.3.0-1ubuntu0.22.04.1 No subscription required
